amendment.description: An amendment numbered 92 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to reduce to $1 the salary of the Director of the Office of New Drugs at the FDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 273 (Roll no. 424).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 273 (Roll no. 424).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
